Package eg

Class TaskRunner

java.lang.Object
eg.TaskRunner
public class TaskRunner
extends java.lang.Object
The starting of tasks with certain predefined settings and behaviour of the UI. All 'run...' methods update the file tree after completion of a task.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter
    The printing of output to the console

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskRunner

      public TaskRunner​(MainWin mw, Console cons, ProcessStarter proc, java.lang.Runnable fileTreeUpdate)
      Parameters:
      mw - the reference to MainWin
      cons - the reference to Console
      proc - the reference to ProcessStarter
      fileTreeUpdate - the updating of the file tree

  • Method Details

    • consolePrinter

      public TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter consolePrinter()
      Gets this ConsolePrinter. The print methods are only unlocked for a task that is run by runWithConsoleOutput(java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.String, boolean)
      Returns:
      the ConsolePrinter

    • runWithConsoleOutput

      public void runWithConsoleOutput​(java.lang.Runnable r, java.lang.String initialMsg, boolean toTop)
      Runs the specified Runnable in a separate thread. The Runnable is supposed to use TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter for output to the console. If the console is blocked by another task a warning dialog is shown and the thread is not started.
      Parameters:
      r - the Runnable
      initialMsg - the message that is printed to the console before the thread is started; maybe null or the empty string
      toTop - true to move to the top of the console after the task is finished
      See Also:
      TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter

    • runBusy

      public void runBusy​(java.lang.Runnable r)
      Runs the specified Runnable at the end of pending EDT events and shows the wait cursor during processing
      Parameters:
      r - the Runnable

    • runSystemCommand

      public void runSystemCommand​(java.lang.String cmd)
      Runs a system process which uses the console to show output/error and read input. If the conosle is blocked by another task a warning dialog is shown and the process is not started.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the system command
      See Also:
      ProcessStarter
